\"Launch on system start\" only works in: "Qalisa ukuqala kohlelo" isebenza kuphela ezindaweni ze-desktop ezihambisana ne-XDG. Ukuze unike amandla isithonjana se-Mailspring kwisitimela sesistimu, kungadingeka ukuthi ufake i-libappindicator.
%@ has been installed and enabled. No ne: %@ ifakwe futhi inikwe amandla. Asikho isidingo sokuqala kabusha! Uma ungaboni i-plugin elayishiwe, hlola i-console ngamaphutha.

By default, mail rules are only applied: Ngokuzenzakalelayo, imilayezo yemeyili isetshenziswa kuphela kwi-imeyili entsha njengoba ifika. Ukusebenzisa imithetho ebhokisini lakho lemilayezo engenayo kungathatha isikhathi eside futhi kudambise ukusebenza.
Can't find the selected thread in your m: Ayikwazi ukuthola intambo ekhethiwe ebhokisini lakho lemeyili
Changes are saved automatically. View th: Izinguquko zilondolozwa ngokuzenzekelayo. Buka i- %@ ngamathiphu namasu.
Click 'Learn More' to view instructions: Chofoza okuthi 'Funda kabanzi' ukuze ubuke imiyalo esisekelweni sethu solwazi.

Click shortcuts above to edit them. For: Chofoza izinqamuleli ngenhla ukuze uzihlele. Ukuze uthole ukulawula okungaphezulu, ungahlela ifayela lezinqamuleli ngezansi.
Combine your search queries with Gmail-s: Hlanganisa imibuzo yakho yokusesha ngezimiso zesitayela se-Gmail njengo- %@ no- %@ ukuthola noma yini ebhokisini lakho lemeyili.
Complete the IMAP and SMTP settings belo: Gcwalisa izilungiselelo ze-IMAP ne-SMTP ngezansi ukuxhuma i-akhawunti yakho.
Connection Error - Unable to connect to: Iphutha lokuxhumeka - Ayikwazi ukuxhuma kuseva / port owawunikezile.

Ayikwazanga ukusetha kabusha ama-akhawunti nezilungiselelo. Sicela ususe ifolda %@ ngesandla.

Create templated messages and fill them: Yakha imilayezo ehlongozwayo futhi ugcwalise ngokushesha ukuze uphendule imilayezo futhi ulungise ngokuzenzakalelayo imisebenzi yakho evamile.

Do you prefer a single panel layout (lik: Ingabe ukhetha isakhiwo sephaneli eyodwa (njenge-Gmail) noma isakhiwo sephaneli ezimbili?
Enable read receipts %@ or link tracking: Nika amandla amaresidi wokufunda %@ noma ukulandelela ukuxhumanisa %@ ukuze ubone izaziso lapha.
Enable verbose IMAP / SMTP logging: Vumela i-verbose IMAP / SMTP ukungena ngemvume
Enter your email account credentials to: Faka imininingwane yakho ye-akhawunti ye-imeyili ukuze uqalise.

Faka imininingwane yakho ye-akhawunti ye-imeyili ukuze uqalise. I-Mailspring 
 igcina iphasiwedi yakho ye-imeyili ngokuphepha futhi ayithunyelwanga kumaseva ethu.
GMX requires that you %@ before using em: I-GMX idinga ukuba %@ ngaphambi kokusebenzisa amaklayenti e-imeyili afana ne-Mailspring.
Get notified when each recipient opens y: Yaziswa uma umamukeli ngamunye evula i-imeyili yakho ukuthumela ukulandelwa kokufika ngesikhathi kanye nezikhumbuzi.
Get reminded if you don't receive a repl: Khumbula ukuthi awutholi impendulo yalo mlayezo esikhathini esibekiwe.
Give your draft a subject to name your t: Nika uhlaka lwakho isihloko ukuze usebenzise ithempulethi yakho.
Gmail IMAP is not enabled. Visit Gmail s: I-IMAP ye-Gmail ayinikwe amandla. Vakashela izilungiselelo ze-Gmail ukuze uyivule.
Gmail bandwidth exceeded. Please try aga: I-bandwidth ye-Gmail idlulile. Sicela uzame futhi emuva kwesikhathi.
Have a GitHub account? Want to contibute: Unayo i-akhawunti yeGitHub? Ufuna ukuhumusha izinguqulo eziningi? Nika ngokuqondile ngesicelo se-Pull!
If you enjoy Mailspring, upgrade to Mail: Uma ujabulela i-Mailspring, thuthukela ku-Mailspring Pro kusuka ku- %@ ukuvumela zonke lezi zici ezinhle kakhulu:
If you write a draft in another language: Uma ubhala uhlaka olulunye ulimi, i-Mailspring izoyihlola ngokuzenzakalelayo futhi isebenzise isichazamazwi esifanele sokupela isipelingi emisho embalwa.
If you've enabled link tracking or read: Uma unike amandla ukulandela ukuxhumanisa noma ukufunda ama-risiti, lezo zenzakalo zizovela lapha!
In order to perform actions on this mail: Ukuze wenze izenzo kuleli bhokisi lemeyili, udinga ukuxazulula inkinga yokuvumelanisa. Vakashela Izintandokazi> Ama-akhawunti ngolwazi oluthe xaxa.
In order to send mail through Mailspring: Ukuze uthumele imeyili nge-Mailspring, i-akhawunti yakho ye-imeyli kufanele ibe nefolda ye-imeyili ethunyelwe. Ungacacisa ifolda Ethunyelwe ngesandla ngokuvakashela Izintandokazi> Amafolda bese ukhetha igama lefolda kusuka kwimenyu ehlisiwe.

Ukuze uthumele i-imeyili nge-Mailspring, i-akhawunti yakho ye-imeyili kufanele ibe nefolda yeDoti. Ungacacisa ifolda yeDoti ngesandla ngokuvakashela Izintandokazi> Amafolda bese ukhetha igama lefolda kusuka kwimenyu ehlisiwe.
Invalid template name! Names can only co: Igama lethemplate elingavumelekile! Amagama angaqukatha kuphela izinhlamvu, izinombolo, izikhala, ama-dashes, kanye nokugcizelela.
It looks like your draft already has som: Kubonakala sengathi uhlaka lwakho seluvele lunomunye okuqukethwe. Ukulayisha lesi template kuzobhala konke okuqukethwe okubhaliwe.
It originates from %@ but replies will g: Ivela ku- %@ kodwa izimpendulo zizoya ku- %@.
Link tracking does not work offline. Ple: Ukulandelela isixhumanisi akusebenzi ku-intanethi. Sicela unike amandla kabusha uma ubuyela ku-intanethi.
Mailspring can no longer authenticate wi: I-Mailspring ayikwazi ukugunyaza no- %@. Iphasiwedi noma ukuqinisekiswa kungenzeka ukuthi kushintshile.
Mailspring can't find your Drafts folder: I-Mailspring ayikwazi ukuthola ifolda yakho Yobulungiswa. Ukudala nokuthumela i-imeyili, vakashela Izintandokazi> Amafolda bese ukhetha Ifolda Yokwakha.
Mailspring could not find the mailsync p: I-Mailspring ingathola inqubo ye-mailsync. Uma wakha i-Mailspring emthonjeni, qiniseka ukuthi i-mailsync.tar.gz ilandelwe futhi ilayishwa kukhophi yakho yokusebenza.
Mailspring could not save an attachment: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukulondoloza isinamathiselo ngoba usuphelile isikhala sedisk.
I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukulondoloza okunamathiselwe. Hlola ukuthi izimvume zihlelwe kahle bese uzama ukuqala kabusha i-Mailspring uma inkinga iqhubeka.
Mailspring could not store your password: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukulondoloza iphasiwedi yakho ngokuphepha. %@ Ukuze uthole olunye ulwazi, vakashela i- %@
Mailspring desktop notifications on Linu: I-Mailspring izaziso zedeskithophu ku-Linux zidinga i-Zenity. Kungase kudingeke ukuyifaka nomphathi wephakheji yakho.
Mailspring encountered errors syncing th: Amaphutha we-Mailspring ahlangabezane nawo avumelanisa le akhawunti. Imibiko yokuphahlazeka ithunyelwe eqenjini le-Mailspring futhi sizosebenza ukulungisa la maphutha ekukhululweni okulandelayo.
Mailspring is clearing it's cache for %@: I-Mailspring isula isilondolozi se- %@. Kuye ngobukhulu bebhokisi lemeyili, lokhu kungathatha imizuzwana embalwa noma imizuzu embalwa. Isixwayiso sizovela lapho ukuhlanza kuqediwe.
Mailspring is independent %@ software, a: I-Mailspring isofthiwe esizimele %@, futhi imali yokubhalisa ivumela ukuthi sisebenzise isikhathi sokulondoloza nokuthuthukisa umkhiqizo.
Mailspring is running in dev mode and ma: I-Mailspring isebenza kwimodi ye-dev futhi ingase ihambe kancane!
Mailspring is syncing this thread and it: I-Mailspring ivumelanisa le ntambo futhi izinamathisela efwini. Ngemicu ende, lokhu kungathatha isikhashana.
Mailspring reset the local cache for %@: I-Mailspring usethe kabusha isilondolozi sendawo %@ ku- %@ amasekhondi. Ibhokisi lakho lemeyili manje lizoqala ukuvumelanisa futhi.
Mailspring shows you everything about yo: I-Mailspring ikukhombisa konke mayelana noxhumana nabo ngaphakathi ngaphakathi kwebhokisi lakho lokungenayo. Bona imininingwane ye-LinkedIn, i-Twitter bios, umlando womlayezo, nokuningi.
Mailspring was unable to modify your key: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukuguqula ama-keymaps wakho ku- %@.
Mailspring was unable to read the conten: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukufunda okuqukethwe kwe-templates directory yakho (%@). Ungase ufune ukususa le folda noma uqinisekise izimvume zesistimu zihlelwe kahle.
Mailspring was unable to reset the local: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukusetha kabusha i-cache yendawo. %@
Mailspring was unable to write to the fi: I-Mailspring ayikwazanga ukubhalela endaweni yefayili oyibeke (%@).

Resurface messages to the top of the inb: Imilayezo yokubuyisela phezulu ebhokisini lemilayezo engenayo uma ungaxhunyiwe
Scaling adjusts the entire UI, including: Ukulinganisa kulungisa i-UI yonke, kufaka phakathi izithombe, abahlukanisi, kanye nombhalo. Imilayezo oyithumelayo izobe isenosayizi efanayo wefonti. Ukunciphisa isikali ngokuphawulekayo kungenza abahlukanisi nezinkampani ezincane kakhulu ukuba zichofoze.
Schedule messages to re-appear later to: Imilayezo yesimiso ukuze uvele futhi kamuva ukugcina ibhokisi lakho lokungenayo lihlanzekile futhi ugxile kuma-todos asheshayo.
Schedule messages to send at the ideal t: Imilayezo yesimiso ukuze uthumele ngesikhathi esifanele sokwandisa isilinganiso sakho sempendulo ye-imeyli noma u-automate ukuphonsa ama-imeyli.
Schedule this message to send at the ide: Hlela lo mlayezo ukuze uthumele ngesikhathi esifanele. I-Mailspring yenza kube lula ukulawula i-spacetime ye-spacetime!
See detailed information about companies: Bona ulwazi oluningiliziwe mayelana nezinkampani ozithumele i-imeyili, kufaka phakathi usayizi wabo, imali kanye nesikhathi sesikhathi.
See when recipients click links in your: Bona ukuthi abamukeli bachofoze izixhumanisi kuma-imeyili wakho ukuze ukwazi ukulandela ngokuqondile
See when recipients open this email: Bona ukuthi abamukeli bavula le imeyili
Send more than one message using the sam: Thumela imilayezo engaphezu kweyodwa usebenzisa i-%@ efanayo noma umugqa wokuqhathanisa ukuqhathanisa amazinga avulekile namazinga okuphendula.
Sent from Mailspring, the best free emai: Kuthunyelwe kusuka ku-Mailspring, uhlelo lokusebenza elingcono kakhulu lwe-imeyili lomsebenzi
Show Gmail-style important markers (Gmai: Bonisa izimpawu ezibalulekile zesitayela se-Gmail (i-Gmail kuphela)

This looks like a Gmail account! While i: Lokhu kubonakala njenge-akhawunti ye-Gmail! To develop plugins, you should run Mails: Ukuze uthuthukise ama-plugin, kufanele usebenzise i-Mailspring ngamabhulegi wokuhlukumeza. Lokhu kukunikeza imilayezo engalungile engcono, inguqulo yokulungisa iphutha lokuphendula, nokuningi. Ungakhubaza noma kunini kusuka kumenyu yonjiniyela.
To listen for the Gmail Oauth response,:
Ukuze ulalele impendulo ye-Gmail Oauth, i-Mailspring idinga ukuqala i-webserver ku-port $ {LOCAL_SERVER_PORT}. Sicela ubuyele futhi uzama ukuxhumanisa i-akhawunti yakho futhi. Uma leli phutha liqhubeka, sebenzisa inketho ye-IMAP / SMTP ngephasiwedi yohlelo lokusebenza lwe-Gmail.
